attributes.action: Support the European Union Membership (Referendum) Bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 16 Dec 2009 Douglas Carswell, MP for Harwich and Clacton, introduced a 'Bill in the House of Commons that would give the people a direct vote on Britain's membership of the European Union; the European Union Membership (Referendum) Bill'.

We urge the Prime Minister to fully support this Bill and ensure it's implementation before May 2010.
